scripts.copy-abi: SRC=../armada-contracts && DST=$(pwd) && rm -rf ./abi && mkdir ./abi && cd ${SRC}/deployments && tar c {staging,testnet}/*.json | tar x -C ${DST}/abi
scripts.gen-types: rm -rf ./types && for SRC in ./abi/*; do DST=./types/$(basename ${SRC}); echo "Generating ${DST}"; npx typechain --target=ethers-v5 --out-dir ${DST} ${SRC}/*.json; done
